Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey, guys! Here's a quick rundown of what people are buzzing about on social media today! A former Labor minister quoted about budget blowouts, a potential tax bump for gas producers in May's budget, the discussion of budget surpluses under Labor, criticism of MP entitlements, and questioning why Australia isn't doing more to adopt Norway's approach to taxing oil companies. But it's not all doom and gloom with news that surging tax receipts have boosted the federal budget, leaving the prospect of Jim Chalmers being the first Labor Treasurer since Paul Keating to deliver a budget surplus in sight.
